Varicose veins
Varicose veins are veins which 
have become swollen. The 
veins in the legs are most 
commonly	affected.	You	can	
also get varicose veins in 
the vulva (vaginal opening). 
They usually get better after 
delivery. Tell your doctor or 
midwife if you have varicose 
veins or if a close relative 
has ever had a clot or blood 
clotting disorder as you 
will need assessments as 
pregnancy
